ca.dracode.ais.indexer

Class FileSearcher.PagedIntComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.FieldComparator<T>
      • org.apache.lucene.search.FieldComparator.NumericComparator<java.lang.Integer>
        • ca.dracode.ais.indexer.FileSearcher.PagedIntComparator
  • Enclosing class:
    FileSearcher

    public abstract class FileSearcher.PagedIntComparator
extends org.apache.lucene.search.FieldComparator.NumericComparator<java.lang.Integer>
    Adapted from Lucene 4.7 IntComparator

    Identical but intended for sorting pages of a document starting at a certain page. Previous pages are added to the end of the list

    Since:
    v0.4
